statements: SELECT * FROM bioremediation_microorganisms WHERE organism_id = 1;
SELECT organism_name, growth_rate FROM bioremediation_microorganisms WHERE growth_rate > 0.05;
SELECT organism_id, organism_name, survival_rate FROM bioremediation_microorganisms ORDER BY organism_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioremediation_microorganisms WHERE growth_rate < 0.1 AND survival_rate > 0.5;
SELECT organism_id, organism_name FROM bioremediation_microorganisms ORDER BY organism_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM bioremediation_microorganisms WHERE organism_id = 1;
SELECT organism_name, growth_rate FROM bioremediation_microorganisms WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY organism_name DESC;
SELECT organism_name, survival_rate FROM bioremediation_microorganisms WHERE survival_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY survival_rate ASC;
SELECT organism_id, organism_name, growth_rate, survival_rate FROM bioremediation_microorganisms WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 AND survival_rate > 0.3;
SELECT MAX(growth_rate) AS max_growth_rate, MIN(survival_rate) AS min_survival_rate FROM bioremediation_microorganisms;
SELECT * FROM Microorganism WHERE organism_id = 1;
SELECT organism_name, growth_rate FROM Microorganism ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM BioremediationProject WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT organism_name, survival_rate FROM Microorganism WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM BioremediationProject ORDER BY start_date ASC, project_name DESC;
SELECT organism_id, organism_name FROM Microorganism WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY organism_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM BioremediationProject WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT organism_name, growth_rate FROM Microorganism WHERE growth_rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.6 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC, organism_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Microorganism JOIN BioremediationProject ON Microorganism.organism_id = BioremediationProject.project_id WHERE survival_rate > 0.8;

SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_organisms FROM Microorganism JOIN BioremediationProject ON Microorganism.organism_id = BioremediationProject.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_organisms DESC;
SELECT * FROM microorganisms;
SELECT id, name, growth_rate FROM microorganisms WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM bioremediation_projects WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT project_id, tracking_date, total_population FROM microorganism_tracking ORDER BY total_population DESC;
SELECT * FROM microorganisms WHERE name LIKE '%bacillus%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM microorganisms ORDER BY name DESC, growth_rate ASC;
SELECT id, name, survival_rate FROM microorganisms WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM bioremediation_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT m.name AS microorganism_name, p.project_name, t.tracking_date FROM microorganisms m JOIN microorganism_tracking t ON m.id = t.microorganism_id JOIN bioremediation_projects p ON p.id = t.project_id;

SELECT m.name AS microorganism_name, t.tracking_date, t.total_population FROM microorganisms m JOIN microorganism_tracking t ON m.id = t.microorganism_id WHERE t.total_population > 1000 ORDER BY t.total_population DESC;
SELECT * FROM microorganisms;
SELECT id, name, growth_rate FROM microorganisms WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT id, experiment_id, observation_date, observation_note FROM observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM microorganisms WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, survival_rate FROM microorganisms WHERE growth_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY survival_rate DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT experiment_date, temperature, ph_level FROM experiments WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;

SELECT o.observation_date, m.name, e.experiment_date FROM observations o JOIN microorganisms m ON o.microorganism_id = m.id JOIN experiments e ON o.experiment_id = e.id WHERE m.name LIKE '%bacteria%' AND e.temperature > 25 ORDER BY e.experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM microorganism_survival_rates;
SELECT organism_name, growth_rate FROM microorganism_survival_rates ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM sample_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_details WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT team_name, lead_researcher FROM research_team WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM microorganism_survival_rates;
SELECT organism_name, growth_rate FROM microorganism_survival_rates WHERE growth_rate > 3.0;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_details ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_date, quantity FROM sample_data WHERE quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT experiment_id, sample_id, temperature, ph_level FROM experimental_data WHERE temperature < 25.0;
